page.description: Lets you append strings in the template when variables are undefined.

section.description: This command simplifies the following, much more cumbersome, template:
For example, take this JSON data.

Using this template an 'if' command is fired when the 'state' field equals MA. When this happens if the 'nothere' and 'nothereeither' are undefined, because they don't exist in the data, then a 'Theses Variables are undefined' statement is shown.

section.example:
Employee name:Fred Employee from MA These Variables are undefined
Employee name:Laura
Employee name:Junior Employee from MA These Variables are undefined
Employee name:Bill
